name: Dash Arena ([Platinum])
description:
music by Abstraction,
also check his itch.io page: 

Tallbeard Studios

 
A small game I made in the span of 3 days.

"Fight! Fight! Fight in the arena! How long can you survive?"

Controls:
Simply click/tap the blue arrows that show up once it's your turn.

hitting enemies will bounce you anti-clockwise, letting you chain for a combo.

blue orbs are health, and blue orbs in a white box increase your max health.
